TopicTitle: Review/Spotlight of the Sounding Rockets Mod - By: RoverDude

Articles.Content: Check out the Sounding Rockets Mod Spotlight on YouTube: http://youtu.be/t4a6ehvMH4A
Just a question: Why exactly did you launch the rocket from the Runway when you could just as easily (and maybe more) do it from the Launch Pad?

I was showcasing the parts in the SPH. The SPH allows you to freely move the camera around to look at parts, while the VAB does not. I just didn't switch between the two. I didn't think having a real launchpad was important, as I was only launching cardboard model rockets after all =P
